entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as not speaking since her return to the castle. Her hair is untidy and there are bits of twig and leaf in it. She seems unscathed but Madam Pomfrey says she's just in shock.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is described as saying that Umbridge is just in shock.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as whispering to her friends about Umbridge's behavior and making a joke about her being 'sulking'. She also makes a comment about centaurs.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as saying that Umbridge is sulking and laughing with Hermione when she sees Umbridge react to Ron's joke.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as making soft clip-clopping noises with his tongue, which makes Umbridge sit bolt upright.

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: Centaurs are mentioned by Hermione in a conversation about Umbridge's behavior.

relationships.description: Ron's joke elicits a reaction from Umbridge, who sits bolt upright.
Hermione mentions centaurs in a conversation about Umbridge's behavior.
